ValidationRule.description: Do not allow an AE to change discount expiration date once the discount has been approved.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), ISPICKVAL(Discount_Approval_Status__c, 'Approved'), ISCHANGED(Checkout_Discount_Expiration_Date_Time__c), CreatedDate > DATETIMEVALUE("2018-09-12 00:00:00"), OR(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'AE'), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'ADR')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your express discount and its expiration date has been approved, and therefore you cannot change it. Contact your manager and resubmit your discount for approval.
